Name: Cat People
Details: An urban legend for the Inner Sphere, 'cat people' are claimed to have existed during the Star League, when lost genetic manipulation techniques allowed for the rich and powerful to mix feline characteristics such as tails, night vision or whiskers. While no proof has ever appeared of such advanced science, this myth has several followers throughout certain parts of the Periphery, who cosmetically or surgically modify their bodies while consuming powerful hormonal drugs.
